message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I think it will be highly valuable to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $8,000. Would you consider lowering the price?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe that $8,000 would be a fair price for the product. Could we possibly meet at that point?
